description: The error is a compile/runtime error of DependencyInjection. The problem is that when attempting to inject a union type into a method, an error is thrown. The union type is not supported and the injection fails.
code:
# Program to represent a Union

# Create a class to represent a Union
class Union:

    # Initialize the Union with its members
    def __init__(self, members):
        self.members = members

    # Return the members of the Union
